title: Jordan Peterson vs. the Celebrity Atheists.  Pt. 1 Do Religious States Fare Worse?
description:
The long awaited Unbelievable conversation between Jordan Peterson and Susan Blackmore is out and it did not disappoint. Why does Jordan Peterson seek engagement with "Celebrity Atheists" who are often Materialists? What do these engagements accomplish? 

Celebrity Atheists like to assert that religion is a bad thing and should be done away with. Jordan Peterson sees it as establishing the metaphorical substrate for our civilization based on the Imago Dei or the Image of God. 

Unbelievable Video https://youtu.be/syP-OtdCIho 
Dr. Melanie Brewster at Scepticon https://youtu.be/fB7Dlwaufyk 
Jonathan Haidt the Rationalist Delusion https://youtu.be/kI1wQswRVaU 

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

To support this channel/podcast on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay
